column36: Receivables are measured at amortised cost, usually equalling nominal value less write-downs for bad and doubtful debts.
column37: The principal activities of the company is to establish and maintain communication solutions for the transport industry.
column38: The accounting policies used in the preparation of the financial statements are consistent with those of last year.
column39: The Company participates in a Danish joint taxation arrangement. According to the joint taxation provisions of the Danish Corporation Tax Act, the Company is therefore liable from the financial year 2013 for income taxes etc for the jointly taxed companies and from 1 July 2012 also for obligations, if any, relating to the withholding of tax on interest, royalties and dividend for the jointly taxed companies.   Apart from this, the Company has no additional continget liabilities.
column41: Cash comprises cash in hand and bank deposits.
column48: The Executive Board has today discussed and approved the annual report of Nomad Digital (Denmark) ApS for the financial year 1 April 2018 â 31 March 2019.
column49: The annual report of Nomad Digital (Denmark) ApS for 2018/19 has been prepared in accordance with the provisions applying to reporting class B entities under the Danish Financial Statements Act with opt-in from higher reporting classes.
column64: We recommend that the annual report be approved at the annual general meeting.
column71: Management confirms that the Company fulfills the requirements to be exempt of audit.
